import React from "react"; import { Button, CloseButton, Modal} from "react-bootstrap"; function ModalDetail({isOpen, hideModal, dataModal}){ return( <> Student
.col-md-6
.col-md-6

ID: {dataModal.id}

Code: {"N"+dataModal.id} - Skill: {dataModal.skill}

Level: {dataModal.level} - Status: {dataModal.status}

Question:
{dataModal.question}

{/*
*/}

Answer:
{dataModal.answer}

); } export default ModalDetail
